name: Asleep
content:
Asleep

Source CRB.273

Related @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.bPDAhCFEP5Jvybhg]{Conditions}

You are sleeping and @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.RxvbSB9ZgSCBu2jw]{Helpless}. While asleep, you take a –10 penalty to Perception checks to notice anything. If you succeed at a Perception check to notice something despite the penalty, you automatically awaken. You are also awoken if you are slapped or wounded. An ally can wake you as a standard action.
